short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a toolbar button to copy a https://fxbsky.app link of the current Bluesky Page to your clipboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that allows a user to quickly copy the current Bluesky page and change the URL to https://fxbsky.app allowing quick embedding on other platforms where Bluesky embeds might be broken.
